ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 238
ygData.msgSnippet: Blur is definitely a good thing, even at level 50. It s a get out of jail free card.  (Do people play monopoly anymore?) While I use different spells in the
ygData.messageBody:
Blur is definitely a good thing, even at level 50.
It's a 'get out of jail free' card. (Do people play
monopoly anymore?)

While I use different spells in the planes (buff and
charm), here is my usual lineup. it has not changed,
other than upgrades to similar spells, from level 30
to 50. I always use them in the same order, so I know
where to find things.

1 Memory Blur
2 Tepid Deeds, or whatever your best slow spell is
3 Chaos FLux, Anarchy... whatever your DD spell is
4 Root (best one again)
5 mesmerize, enthrall, etc.
6 tashan (i, ia)
7 mesmerization (area effect, and yes I have both)
8 utility... rotates for buffs. can be charm or rune
during combat.

Q

--- Arcius <tomaaas@...> wrote:
>
>
> --- Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
> wrote:
> > Yesterdays mes/stun thread...
>
> > Which is why I also have memory
> > blur up at all times.
> > Cast that and usually it will forget you... very
> > rarely Ill have to cast it 2X
>
> Can any of you advise on good tactics for using
> Memory
> Blur? I am level 12 enchantress and have not found
> it
> that useful. It seems with so many spells and so few
> slots, there is always another spell i can use more.
> But seeing a high level enchanter has it memorized
> at
> all times makes me wonder. So, what are good uses
> for
> Memory Blur? Thanks :)
>
> Treana
